MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY10 postcode area of Crail. We are aware of previous power cuts in your area today and we apologise for this. Our engineers are still on site working to investigate and repair an underground cable fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:20am on Friday, 05 February 2021
